Content.Text:
Good morning, <MYNAME>.
Hope I'm not disturbing you.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nice to see you, <MYNAME>.
You've been in town ten days now...
are you getting used to life here?

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good!
That's nice to hear.
<PAGE>
But <MYNAME>... you've never had your
own place before, have you? Do you
know how to cook for yourself?
<PAGE>
If you'd like, I can explain to you
how to cook!

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, I have a kid about your age,
<MYNAME>, who also lives alone.
<PAGE>
So I'm always looking for a chance to
help out someone in that situation...
I'm glad I can help you!

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, let me explain how to cook.
Let's go to your kitchen,

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Check your kitchen and you'll be able
to cook there. Cooking requires
two things: a <GREEN>recipe</GREEN> and <GREEN>ingredients</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
There are eight categories of recipes:
salad, soup, fried, pot, rice,
bread, desserts and drinks.
<PAGE>
To make dishes in each category you
need the set of <GREEN>basic recipes</GREEN>, sold
at the <GREEN>General Store</GREEN>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
While I'm here, I'll go ahead and give
you <GREEN>Basic Bread Recipes</GREEN> and
<GREEN>Basic Dessert Recipes</GREEN>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can give food you cook as gifts!
And for the <RED>Harmony Days</RED> and <RED>Pumpkin
Festival</RED> you need to make desserts.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all I have to tell you,
<MYNAME>!
I'll be going now. Take care!

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In that case, I'll just give you these:
<GREEN>Basic Bread Recipes</GREEN> and
<GREEN>Basic Dessert Recipes</GREEN>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll be going now. Take care!
